definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: His only option for such release besides Betty is Mary Shrike.
sentences.chinese: 他的唯一選擇，例如釋放除了貝蒂是瑪麗伯勞鳥。

sentences.english: Mary will kiss him because she hates Shrike, but will not sleep with him.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗會吻他，因爲她恨伯勞鳥，但不會同他睡覺。

sentences.english: He does, and Shrike leaves the apartment.
sentences.chinese: 他這樣做，和伯勞鳥離開公寓。

definition: to dress up and make up (like an actor)
Tun District – area of Taichung (in Taiwan) between the coastal (western) part of the city and the mountains to the east
Chishang or Chihshang township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
full moon/first full moon after birth (i.e. entering the second month)
